item.title: Autolayout Tips
item.description: So, today is the day your designer hands you a design that has different layout on iPads and looks like a perfect example to use StackViews. Vertical on compact sizes and horizontal on regular. So you start adding the labels and button to your view - in this case using IB. You add some constraints here and there. Group the labels into one or multiple stack views, everything else to another.
